CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1945, pg. 26 reads: "Happy Birthday-Carol Frances Mosby, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Kenny Mosby, of 3071 Centre Avenue, celebrated her eighth birthday by entertaining her friends at a party. Guests, left to right, are: Sharon Castor, Claudette Williams, Alice Scott, Shirley Williams, Richard Dorsey.  Second row: Carol Francis, Francis Smith, Sherman Gordon, Anna Smith, Blanche Scott, Kenneth Scott and Ronald Scott.  Not shown in picture are Samuel Jones Jr. and Vincent Tibbs Jr. Carol's father is stationed at Fort Bragg,  North Carolina. - Harris Photo.
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, front row, left to right, Sharon Castor, Claudette Williams wearing plaid dress, Alice Scott, Shirley Williams, Carol Francis Mosby wearing striped shirt, standing behind birthday cake, Anna Smith, and Blanche Scott,  back row, left to right, Richard Dorsey, Francis Smith, Sherman Gordon wearing necktie, Kenneth Scott, and Ronald Scott, standing around table in home of Mr. and Mrs. Kenny Mosby of 3071 Centre Avenue
